verses.name: Job 38:13
verses.text: That it might take hold of the ends of the earth, that the wicked might be shaken out of it?

verses.name: Job 38:14
verses.text: It is turned as clay to the seal; and they stand as a garment.

verses.name: Job 38:15
verses.text: And from the wicked their light is withholden, and the high arm shall be broken.

verses.name: Job 38:16
verses.text: Hast thou entered into the springs of the sea? or hast thou walked in the search of the depth?

verses.name: Job 38:17
verses.text: Have the gates of death been opened unto thee? or hast thou seen the doors of the shadow of death?
